H0.text: Which constituency did Harold Macmillan represent when he was Prime Minister. Stockton-on-Tees

H1.text: Which constituency did Harold Macmillan represent when he was Prime Minister. Leeds North

H2.text: Which constituency did Harold Macmillan represent when he was Prime Minister. Hexham

H3.text: Which constituency did Harold Macmillan represent when he was Prime Minister. Bromly

A4.text: He was perhaps the most famous MP for Bromley, serving from the 1945 by-election until his retirement in 1964
